alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Interior York; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 07 at 3:31PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern York, south central Androscoggin, central Cumberland and central Sagadahoc Counties through 415 PM EST... At 330 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a heavy rain shower along a line extending from near Raymond to near Standish to near Waterboro. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Portland, South Portland, Brunswick, Westbrook, Bath, Topsham, Cumberland, Gorham, Falmouth, Cape Elizabeth, Buxton, Freeport, Gray, Hollis, Standish, Yarmouth, Raymond, Scarborough, Woolwich, and Waterboro. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 1 and 32. Interstate 95 between mile markers 42 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Interior York; Sagadahoc
